name: fakturownia-invoiceocean
description: Manage invoices, clients, and payments across all Fakturownia / InvoiceOcean platforms.

tools.name: list_invoices
tools.description: Lists invoices from Fakturownia with period filtering.

tools.name: get_invoice
tools.description: Retrieves complete invoice details including line items.

tools.name: create_invoice
tools.description: Creates a new invoice for an existing client.

tools.name: list_clients
tools.description: Retrieves a paginated list of clients.

tools.name: get_client
tools.description: Retrieves complete details of a specific client identified by their ID.

tools.name: create_client
tools.description: Creates a new client in the system.

tools.name: list_products
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all products.

tools.name: get_product
tools.description: Retrieves the complete details of a specific product by its ID.

tools.name: create_product
tools.description: Adds a new product to the catalog.

tools.name: get_department
tools.description: Retrieves details of a specific department.
